# @launchpadlab/eslint-config

Shareable eslint configs to use across projects.

## Usage:

```js
// .eslintrc.js:

// To use a specific config
module.exports = {
  extends: '@launchpadlab/eslint-config/react',
}

// To use the default config (react-rails)
module.exports = {
  extends: '@launchpadlab',
}
```
